K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:1b-1: a'arya aa ba lo ki te shva ra n'a ma dha ra ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:1b-3: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs zhes bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:1b-4: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2a-0: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byams pa'i ngang las snying rje'i shugs kyis byang chub kyi sems @2a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2a-1: rab tu bskyed nas padma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2a-3: zla ba'i gdan la hr'i:'i 'phro 'du las zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2a-4: dang po gnyis thal mo sbyar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2a-5: g-yas 'og ma na bgrang phreng mu tig dkar po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2a-6: g-yon 'og ma na padma dkar po bsnams pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2a-7: sku mdog dkar po zhabs rdzogs pa'i skyil krung bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2a-8: rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2a-9: rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis mdzes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2a-10: ma lha mo drug ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2a-11: yab nor bu rin po ches brten pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2b-0: sems ma rab tu mang pos bskor te @2b 'di skad ces gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2b-2: rigs kyi bu mos sngags 'di lan gcig brjod dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2b-3: dran zhing yid la byas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2b-4: bris nas lus la bcangs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2b-5: mos shing gus par byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2b-7: de dang nye ba'i sdig pa'i las thams cad byang zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2b-10: sdug bsngal dang bcas par mi skye'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2b-13: gcan gzan gyi 'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2b-14: nad dang gdon thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2b-16: zhes brjod pas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:2b-17: tshe 'phos nas kyang bde ba can du skye ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-092-001:3a-2: 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzungs rdzogs so ////
